title: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
description: Alternative cover edition of ISBN 014002235X'The five girls, standing very close to each other because of the boys, wore their hats each with a definite difference.These girls formed the Brodie set.'And when an unbridled schoolmistress with advanced ideas is in her prime, the classroom can take on a new identity and no one can predict what will happen.Muriel Spark's sparkling, witty story of Miss Brodie's prime and fall is unbeatable.
author: Muriel Spark
